trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Vallejo
There were no other sightings in Vallejo on or around September 18th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my back porch looking straight up at the stars in a dark moonless sky when a grey triangular shaped object with what may have been a tail cruised on a straight path by right overhead. The sighting lasted about 12 seconds, and as the object moved away I lost sight of it's silhouetted form. It appeared rather large, obscuring stars as it past over me. The night was quiet and still. It had no lights and made no sound. The UFO traveled from the northwest to the southeast at what I would call medium constant speed. I truly believe the object was a UFO.
Summary: Triangular grey object cruises overhead with no lights or sound
